original_text: So Jeremiah abode in the court of the prison until the day that Jerusalem was taken: and he was there when Jerusalem was taken.
korean_text: 예레미야가 예루살렘이 함락되는 날까지 감옥 뜰에 머물렀더라

sentences.original_text: So Jeremiah abode in the court of the prison
until the day that Jerusalem was taken
and he was there when Jerusalem was taken
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예루살렘이 함락될 때 그는 그곳에 있었다
